Next, examining the second row, which is under the "tackles" position, the names listed are "ed weir ralph chase." This matches the second part of the claim, confirming that both Ed Weir and Ralph Chase play the tackle position.

Now, regarding the relevant cells for each verification:
- For the first part (ends position), the cell is found at row index 0 under the "name" column.
- For the second part (tackles position), the cell is found at row index 1 under the "name" column.
